spells.name: Badger's Ferocity
spells.description: Weapons are keen while you concentrate.

spells.name: Burrow
spells.description: Target gains a burrow speed of 15.

spells.name: Mad Monkeys
spells.description: Summon a swarm of mischievous monkeys.

spells.name: Rain of Frogs
spells.description: Summon a swarm of poisonous frogs.

spells.name: Vermin Shape I
spells.description: Take the form and some of the powers of a Small or Medium vermin.
